Text: Help make this torrent strong, if you d/l it, SEED IT !! or maybe reconsider if bitorrent is right for you!

Y'know what? I just want to say something. These constant hostile comments about seeding don't accomplish anything except to fill these pages with bitterness and rage, all because you're not getting your free, pirated media fast enough.

What's the point? You're not going to get anybody to do anything by yelling at them or lecturing them. Mention it politely, though, and you might. As it stands, all you're doing is acting like a spoiled child.

I will seed 5-10 gigs before I disconnect
 hope it helps
